I first went to her for guidance when we were to try for a baby. She explained well, ** *********** ***** **** ***** Gave follic acid and within 3 months I was pregnant. No further visit was required.

Initially I did not feel the doctor much friendly but later when I got covid, and was scared, in this situation as well she adviced some vitamins and said, be confident, and that words were so promising and she filled that strength to fight covid, being a friend.

Thanks to all the care and strength given to me by you mam.

I would say, unfortunately I had to shift my hospital as I had to shift to my parents place considering this is my first pregnancy and could not continue here for delivery. But there can be no other concern for you once you approach her.

I would surely recommend her to everyone.. Also if I would plan a second one, sure I would go only to her. You are in safe hands if you have visited here.

Thanks again mam, for giving so much hope and strength and finally for giving us a beautiful baby girl. We have no words, and grateful tht we found such a good doctor.
